jcr:content.jcr:title: Brands We Can't Ship Outside United States
jcr:content.pageProperty_titleTag: Brands We Can't Ship Outside United States | Backcountry.com
jcr:content.seo-title: Brands We Can't Ship Outside U.S. | Backcountry.com
jcr:content.pageProperty_description: Due to contracts with the following brands, we are unable to ship any of their products outside the US.

text.text: Due to contracts with the following brands, we are unable to ship any of their products outside the US. If you attempt to order one of these brands and have it shipped outside the US, we will contact you and cancel the order. However, it is OK to purchase any of these products with an international credit card and have the product shipped to a US address.

*We cannot ship Ibis outside of the USA except to South Africa.

*We cannot ship Ridley Bikes to the United Kingdom, Europe and Japan.

*We can only ship Haglofs to the United States and Canada.

*We can only ship Shimano to the United States and Canada.

*We can only ship Niner to the United States and Canada.

*We can only ship Dynafit to the United States and Canada.

*We can only ship Salewa to the United States and Canada.

*We cannot ship XCEL Hawaii to Canada.

*We cannot ship food products to Australia.

*We cannot ship KASK Helmets to Australia.

*We can ship ENVE Composites only to the US except for Puerto Rico, Mexico, Brazil and Argentina.

*We can ship Gnu & Lib Tech only to US and Canada.

*We can ship Hammerhead only to the United States, Canada, and South Africa.
